virtual-sensor.name: Matterhorn_Dozer_NodeHealth__chart3
virtual-sensor.description: backlog health status at Matterhorn deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, SYSVOLTAGE from Matterhorn_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv__1950

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 1, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 1, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 2, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 2, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 3, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 3, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 4, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 4, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 5, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 5, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 6, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 6, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 7, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 7, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 8, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 8, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 9, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 9, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 10, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 10, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 11, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 11, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 12, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 12, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 13, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 13, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 14, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 14, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 15, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 15, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 16, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 16, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 17, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 17, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 18, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 18, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 19, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 19, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 20, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 20, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 21, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 21, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 22, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 22, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 23, SYSVOLTAGE, null) as 23 from wrapper where GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
